alert.note: Alert for Hemphill; Ochiltree; Roberts (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 5:10AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Roberts, Hemphill and southeastern Ochiltree Counties through 545 AM CDT... At 510 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 22 miles northwest of Codman to 8 miles northeast of Lake Marvin. Movement was south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Canadian, Miami, Glazier, Codman, Lake Marvin and Lora. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CDT for the Panhandle of Texas. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for the Panhandle of Texas.
